thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 3 of 111
thread.title: Jeremy Lewis
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Jeremy Lewis

author: Jeremy Lewis
title: Jeremy Lewis
text: choice assigned a local repair company that came out and fixed a leak on the washing machine. Made appointment for next business day. Choice did a great job of following up to make sure I had been contacted and then followed up to make sure repairs were done.
